DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate real world pattern of use of BOTOX® in actual clinical practice in patients with idiopathic overactive bladder (iOAB) with urinary incontinence whose symptoms have not been adequately managed by oral anticholinergic therapy.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of BOTOX® for the Management of Urinary Incontinence in Patients With Idiopathic Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: No prior treatment with botulinum toxin Type A for treatment of iOAB Treatment with any botulinum toxin Type A within 18 months
